scripts.cypress:local: cypress open --e2e --browser chrome --env env=local,TAGS="not (@test or @dev or @ignoreLocal or @ignore)"
scripts.cypress:local:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=local,TAGS="not (@test or @dev or @ignoreLocal or @ignore)" --browser chrome --headed --headed && npm run report
scripts.cypress:dev:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=dev,TAGS="not (@test or @ignore)" --browser chrome --headed && npm run report
scripts.cypress:test:all: npm run config:reports && npm run delete:reports && cypress run --env env=test,TAGS="not (@dev or @ignore)" --browser chrome --headed && npm run report
scripts.config:reports: mkdirp report/HTML report/JSON cypress/screenshots && npx cpx '.tools/createTestFromScenario.js' 'node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js'
